channel.title: Get ID's of ingame objects [PI] [Solved]
channel.description: Hello, I'm trying to get the Object ID's of the Ingame objects. For example doors, trapdoors ect. I tryed to log on with the moparscape client, but it didnt work. I'm having a ID list, but there are 100's of doors... (It's 317)

item.title: Get ID's of ingame objects [PI] [Solved]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

There is a way to do it with a simple client side edit. I believe the MoparScape client had it. If you’d like, I can take a look at the client when I get home and send you a patch.

Basically it would show the number when you mouse over it

Read full topic

item.title: Get ID's of ingame objects [PI] [Solved]
item.dc:creator: @ritonda ritonda
item.description:
@ritonda wrote:

oh ok. I though there is an otherway then sendMessage(“ObjectID: “+objectID+”, objX: " +absX+”, objY: "+absY);… (I’m already using it)

Read full topic

item.title: Get ID's of ingame objects [PI] [Solved]
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Just to explain what ohokay said,

Go to you’re object clicking method and add something like
sendMessage(“ObjectID: “+objectID+”, objX: " +absX+”, objY: "+absY);

I’m not sure if PI uses absX and absY or objectID so you may have to change that by changing them to what the int is named.

Read full topic

item.title: Get ID's of ingame objects [PI] [Solved]
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

When you click an object, just make it return the object id

Read full topic
